Description: On I-77 at mile marker 2.5 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.

Description: On VA-36 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of University Ave, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 292.9 in the City of Chesapeake, near High Rise Bridge, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 North at mile marker 60.6 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash.
